channel.title: spring 2015 on Michael Pilosov: The Archives
channel.description: Recent content in spring 2015 on Michael Pilosov: The Archives

item.title: Evolution of Cooperation
item.description: I began graduate school in the summer of 2014 You can find more information about the article, including links to code, pdf, and the co-author’s website on the publication page. Please pardon our mess. This page is still a work in progress. I have many projects that I am documenting simultaneously and am doing my best to be thorough and embed a lot of rich metadata so that you can click around based on what you find interesting.
